name: wrixt
description: Simplistic, classless, responsive, good looking css with dark mode support.

scripts.readme: tail -n +6 README.md | marked --gfm --no-mangle | cat index.head.html - index.tail.html > index.html
scripts.watch: nodemon -e css,md -i wrixt.min.css -x 'npm run minify && npm run readme'
